name: Football Gauntlet
description:
Football Gauntlet is a small football project that started in late 2013. Unlike conventional football games, the main objective of Football Gauntlet is to keep the ball away from the opposing team as best as possible. The opposing team touching the ball will result in failure. This is also the case if the ball goes out of play.

There are three different game modes, all varying in playstyles and requirements, providing unique and challenging gameplay - this with the inclusion of varying difficulties.

This is by all means a game for everyone, you do not need to be a football fan, or even a sports fan to enjoy Football Gauntlet. Hopefully you will give it a try and have an enjoyable experience!

Lastly, ALL feedback is very much appreciated. Thanks for visiting this page!

Additional notes: Pressing the M key whilst in game returns you to the main menu.

The distance and speed at which the ball moves to is dependent upon the location of the mouse cursor.
